meanings.definition: Not moving or capable of being moved.
meanings.sent1: The nonmoving rock sat still in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The nonmoving car was parked in the driveway all day.
meanings.sent3: The nonmoving toy soldier seemed to be on a never-ending break.
meanings.sent4: The nonmoving clouds painted a static picture in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The nonmoving statue in the park was a popular spot for photos.

meanings.sent1: The nonmoving clock on the wall showed the same time for days.
meanings.sent2: The nonmoving water in the pond reflected the trees perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The nonmoving storyline in the book left the readers puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The nonmoving traffic jam seemed like a never-ending nightmare.
meanings.sent5: The nonmoving caterpillar stayed in its cocoon for weeks.
